Comment: Already setting up a cramped position.
Very bad. Now White can seize control at once.
3... P-K4! would at least put up a fight.
Threatening 5 N-N5 with irresistable pressure on KB7.
5... K-B1 woukd drag things out a bit longer.
Black can now either lose his Queen or his King.
If the K returns to the 1st rank, 7 N-K6 wins the Q. So Black plays this move...
